amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to extending vital enhanced advance premium tax credits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1602 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1602 proposed by Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1717. To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to extending vital enhanced advance premium tax credits.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1602 proposed by Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1717.
